title: fmt: does not differentiate nil map/slice from their empty value
body:
by **jbjcalmels**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go1.3

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. http://play.golang.org/p/_yhucaTieJ

What happened?
[]
[]
map[]
map[]

What should have happened instead?
<nil>
[]
<nil>
map[]

Please provide any additional information below.

Attached a patch to fix the issue (it may not cover all the corner cases though)
Attachments: 1. print.patch (788 bytes)
